changes: Added Option to synchronize with a remote server
To do this build the file-sync-server from the server directory
Copy the file-sync-server on a server
Copy the config file to the server and adjust the values
Run the file-sync-server (make sure the port you configured is open)
In options, set the sync url, port and Access-Key
Click the upload button with a component selected to upload it to the server
Click the download button in a launcher tab to download uploaded components
Added additional info to update process
fixes: Changed how the launcher authenticates itself with curseforge and modrinth
Changed error dialog to include more details on the error
updateInfo:
IMPORTANT:
This update will break any previous installed version. To fix it, change the following:
- In `app/launcher.conf`, change the `update_url` field to `https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Tre5et/treelauncher/main/client/update/`
- In `app/TreeLauncher.cfg`, change the field `app.classpath` to `$APPDIR\treelauncher-client-all.jar`
